name: Crashlanded (Trias Vitae, Nerissy, Lucas Biano)
description:
A downloadable game for Windows and MacOS.

Oh no! While exploring space on your ship, a malfunction happened and you crashed into a unknown alien planet! Now you need to explore the planet to recover your ship's parts and go back home, but be careful to not explore at night.
Features
  • Explore a New Environment!
    • Crashlanded comes with a unique, hand-crafted map for you to explore!
    Wander trough an mushroom biome, alien forest and a crystal desert while recovering your ship's parts and uncover a mystery that the planet holds within its surface!
  • Grab Your Radar and Go!
    Don't forget to find your lost radar! It will sure come in handy when trying to find those parts that are scattered troughout the planet! Follow the sound or look at the radar and you will find them in no time!
  • You Are Not Alone In Space
    Meet A.L.P.H.A! Your own personal assistant that will help you in this time of crisis, he will be there for you to keep you informed of any happenings or status updates! But sometimes he can get a little sassy, don't worry, the company is working on improving his temper.
  • At Night No One Can Breathe
    No wonder this planet seems almost lifeless if were not by the plants, every night, the mushrooms release their spores so those can become new little mushrooms, but those spores are heavily toxic to anything that breathes, isnt nature beautiful?
Controls
  • spacebar (keyboard)  to jump
  • W, A, S, D (keyboard)  to call to walking
  • L+Shift  and W (keyboard) to run
  • Q (keyboard) to close IA messages
  • E (keyboard) to throw mushroom and parts spaceship
  • R (keyboard) to enter in spacheship and deliver object
  • Left (mouse) to grab object
  • Right (mouse) to drop object
